text: Nikita Novikov (born 10 November 1989) is a Russian cyclist. The Russian Anti- Doping Agency has suspended for him two years from July 6, 2013 until June 6, 2015. ==Palmares== ===Track=== ;2007 :20px World Champion - Points race (Juniors) ===Road=== ;2011 :1st Okolo Slovenska ::1st stages 2 & 8 :1st Tour des Pays de Savoie ::1st Prologue :Stage 2 Giro della Valle d'Aosta ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cyclists Category:Doping cases in cycling Category:People from Vologodsky District Category:Sportspeople from Vologda Oblast
title: Nikita Novikov
